messages.message:
Docker build on `webapp` seems to be broken (on old build server):
```
Local node version is v11.10.0 which is incompatible, please use v8.10.0
depending on how node is installed, you can update it with one of the commands below
nodeenv --node=8.10.0 --prebuilt
nvm install 8.10.0
make: *** [check-node-version] Error 1
```

@dlluncor should I make this error a little better by allowing all versions below 12 (node-sass breaks with 12+)?

@Aaron Tami can you downgrade node on that machine for now if it’s urgent? I’ll get a fix in tomorrow morning
Got it. Yep that makes sense if you're ok with nodr any version from 8 to 11. Also make sure to announce to the infra team if you haven't already! @Eric Han
